name: Introduction to Programming, Part A
description: Introduction to programming fundamentals & problem-solving using the Java language. Covers the first half of CSE 007 concepts, including data types, control flow, introduction to methods, arrays and a breadth of computing.

name: Introduction to Programming, Part B
description: Introduction to problem-solving and object-oriented programming (OOP) using the Java language. Covers the second half of CSE 007 concepts, including methods, arrays, basics of OOP, and a breadth of computing.

name: Introduction to Programming
description: Introduction to problem-solving and OOP using Java. Covers data types, control flow, methods, arrays, and basics of OOP.

name: Introduction to Programming with Python
description: Fundamental concepts of computing and computational thinking using the Python language.

name: Programming and Data Structures
description: Design and implementation of algorithms and data structures using Java. Assumes prior experience using programming concepts.

name: Game Design
description: Modern topics in game design covering systems, interactivity, and the iterative design process.

name: Teaching Assistant Workshop
description: This course is required for all teaching assistants and graders, covering roles, responsibilities, and creating a positive learning environment.

name: Systems Software
description: Design and implementation of modular programs interacting with the operating system using C.

name: Survey of Artificial Intelligence
description: An introduction to artificial intelligence concepts, systems, and history for non-majors.

name: Foundations of Discrete Structures and Algorithms
description: Basic representations used in algorithms and formalizations for proving algorithm correctness.

name: Introduction to Data Science
description: Focus on computational analysis of data, including collection, preparation, and visualization.

name: Special Topics
description: Supervised reading and research on selected topics in computer science.

name: Computer Organization and Architecture
description: Interaction between low-level computer architectural properties and high-level program behaviors.

name: Software Engineering
description: The software lifecycle and models, emphasizing teamwork and large-scale software systems.

name: Computer Science Projects
description: Project-based learning through independent or small-group projects related to computer systems.

name: Database Systems and Applications
description: Design of large databases; integration of databases and applications using SQL and JDBC.

name: Blockchain Algorithms and Systems
description: Blockchain system concepts and cryptographic algorithms for security.

name: Computing Ethics
description: Interactive exploration of ethical and social issues related to computing.

name: Foundations of Robotics
description: Introduction to the field of robotics, covering mathematics and physics.

name: Discrete Structures
description: Topics in discrete structures chosen for their applicability to computer science.

name: Programming Languages
description: Use, structure, and implementation of several programming languages.

name: Web Systems Programming
description: Practical experience in designing and implementing modern web applications.

name: System and Network Administration
description: Overview of systems and network administration in a networked UNIX-like environment.

name: Programming in Linux and Windows Operating Systems
description: Learn Linux and Windows operating system fundamentals, including features and organization.

name: Capstone Project I
description: Design, implementation, and evaluation of a computer science software project, emphasizing project definition.

name: Capstone Project II
description: Continuation of the capstone project sequence, focusing on project implementation, verification, and validation.

name: Apprentice Teaching
description: Practical teaching experience under the supervision of an experienced instructor, learning fundamentals of teaching.

name: Compiler Design
description: Principles of artificial language description and design, including parsing techniques and code optimization.

name: Operating System Design
description: Principles of process and thread management, memory management, and I/O issues in operating systems.

name: Structural Bioinformatics
description: Computational techniques and principles of structural biology used to examine molecular structure and function.

name: Genomics
description: Computational techniques affecting modern biotechnology, including genome assembly and annotation.

name: Assistive Technologies
description: Examines challenges faced by persons with disabilities and the role of assistive technologies.

name: Computer Graphics
description: Algorithms and programming techniques for generating 3D computer graphics.

name: Introduction to the Theory of Computation
description: Deep understanding of computation, its capabilities and limitations using formal methods.

name: Image Analysis and Graphics
description: Techniques for image analysis tasks and related computer graphics methods.

name: Biomedical Image Computing and Modeling
description: Algorithms and software to analyze biomedical image data and extract quantitative information.

name: Computer Vision
description: Techniques from image processing and machine learning to understand visual data.

name: Natural Language Processing
description: Overview of modern NLP techniques, including text normalization, tagging, and machine translation.

name: Fundamentals of Machine Learning
description: Introduction to machine learning techniques, focusing on supervised and unsupervised learning.

name: Artificial Intelligence Theory and Practice
description: In-depth analysis of AI algorithms, knowledge representation, and applications in various fields.

name: User Interface Systems and Techniques
description: Principles of designing effective user interfaces and evaluating user interactions.

name: Methods for Understanding Human-Computer Interactions
description: Research methods for studying interactions between users and computing systems.

name: Topics on Intelligent Decision Support Systems
description: AI techniques for building decision support systems in various applications.

name: Embedded Systems
description: Use of embedded computers and hardware to build systems with specific functionalities.

name: Reinforcement Learning
description: Algorithms for learning from interactions with the environment to optimize performance.

name: Design and Analysis of Algorithms
description: Design and analysis of algorithms focusing on efficiency and correctness.

name: Database Systems, Algorithms, and Applications
description: Comprehensive study of database design, normalization, and query optimization.

name: Fundamentals of Internetworking
description: Architecture and protocols of computer networks including security and privacy.

name: Network Security
description: Overview of network security threats, cryptography, and security protocols.

name: WWW Search Engines
description: Study of algorithms and implementations of web search engines and information retrieval.

name: Data Mining
description: Modern data mining techniques, including model construction and evaluation.

name: Big Data Analytics
description: Large-scale data analysis using frameworks like Apache Spark.

name: Special Topics
description: Selected topics in computer science not included in other courses.

name: Iterative Methods
description: Methods for solving large, sparse linear systems and their applications.

name: Introduction to Mobile Robotics
description: Algorithms for navigation and sensing in mobile robotics.

name: Blockchain Projects
description: Projects related to blockchain systems and applications.

name: Principles of Mobile Computing
description: Fundamental concepts and technology underlying mobile computing.

name: Principles of Practice of Parallel Computing
description: Design and analysis of parallel algorithms for scientific computing.

name: Distributed Systems
description: Theoretical and practical aspects of distributed systems.

name: Honors Project
description: An intensive study culminating in a project report.

name: Independent Study
description: An intensive study of a topic in computer science not covered by other courses.

name: Advanced Computer Architecture
description: Analysis and design of computer architectures, including performance metrics.

name: Advanced Operating Systems
description: Principles and design methodologies for multi-programming systems.

name: Computer Networks
description: Architecture and protocols of computer networks and data communication principles.

name: Advanced Programming Languages
description: Study of programming language design principles and techniques.

name: Research Methods
description: Methods for conducting research and effective presentation of findings.

name: Structural Bioinformatics
description: Computational techniques for examining molecular structures and functions.

name: Bioinformatics: Issues and Algorithms
description: Computational problems arising from bioinformatics data management.
